start.markdown:
**An welchem Punkt benötigt eure Marketing-Pipeline einen echten Push?**

An dieser Stelle benötigen wir einen Vertrauensvorschuss, denn Einblicke und Transparenz sind extrem relevant, um Schätze zu finden und Potenziale zu heben. Wir begrüßen und schätzen deine Offenheit, denn es stellen sich viele Fragen, beispielsweise ob bereits ausreichend Leads zur Zielerreichung generiert werden, wie sich eure Leads und Opportunities durch den Funnel bewegen, wie vieler Touch Points es durchschnittlich bedarf, alles verbunden mit dem Qualitätsaspekt. Gibt es Gaps, um das Pipeline-Ziel zu erreichen und bist du zufrieden mit den Conversion Rates in den einzelnen Stages oder gibt es auch dort Handlungsbedarf?

Auf Basis der Ziele und der Strategie erarbeiten wir zusammen mit dir und deinem Team integrierte Multi-Channel-Kampagnen und Taktiken für alle oder ausgewählte Stages des Funnels und verbinden diese zum idealen Maßnahmen-Mix.

meta.description: Are gaps in the sales & marketing funnel preventing you from reaching market contribution? Are you happy with conversion rates?
meta.keywords: Marketing contribution, Marketing pipeline, Marketing funnel, Sales and marketing funnel, pipeline acceleration, lead generation, marketing funnel optimization, marketing funnel analyse, conversion rates, sales and marketing alignment

start.markdown:
**Your marketing pipeline needs a real push?**

At this point, we need you to take a leap of faith. Why? Because insights and transparency are extremely important for finding any hidden treasures and leveraging the full potential. We appreciate your trust and welcome your openness, because many questions need to be answered, for example: Are you generating enough leads to reach your goals, how are your leads and opportunities moving through the funnel, and how many touch points does it take on average to succeed? All of this always in connection with the quality aspect! And there's more: Are there any gaps that prevent you from reaching the pipeline goals, are you happy with the conversion rates in the individual stages or is there a need for action in this field as well?

Based on the goals and the strategy, we'll work with you and your team to develop integrated, multi-channel campaigns and tactics for all or selected stages of the funnel and combine them into an ideal mix of marketing activities.
